name: Mission Classified
description:
This game is a prototype that was created for our course's game a week semester project. The theme for this game was Ritual.

The game was inspired by the idea of a 'packing ritual' that many people do whenever they pack bags to go on trips or even their everyday carries, except with a twist! This time, you're a spy, packing their bags for a classified mission, and your job is to pack the tools that would get the job done.
